MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML6 postcode area of Plains. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived back on site to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:06pm on Friday, 25 December 2020
